title: Little Stranger
description: OWNING HER IS ALL HE EVER WANTEDShe betrayed him, and now he wants revenge against the foster sister who became his forbidden obsession the second he laid eyes on her. After she sends him to prison for years, heâ€™s free and ready to haunt her.Everything about Olivia belongs to Malachi Vize.Her mindHer bodyHer soulHer fearHer painOn Halloween night, he can no longer lurk in the shadows. All he has left to own is her heart, even if he needs to take it.This story comes with extremely triggering content. Please read the "Content Warning" page.
author: Leigh Rivers
